scripts.lint: jshint lib bin index.js --reporter node_modules/jshint-stylish/stylish.js --exclude node_modules && jscs lib bin test index.js
scripts.test: npm run-script lint && mocha --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks test/
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
